name: Timir Biswas
description: '''Timir Biswas''' ({{langx|bn|তিমির বিশ্বাস}}; born 20 November 1982) is an Indian [[playback singer]] of both Bengali and Hindi films. He also the lead singer of the band '''Fakira'''. He originates from Sreepally, [[Asansol]], West Bengal and belongs to a Bengali family.
